root: ^The chief engineer, Ratchet, contacts you, "There seems to be a problem. Some of the hull plating on the outside of the ship seems to be loose. If left be, it will likely damage the ship. Unfortunately, the only way to fix this problem is to have some crew members go out and fix it. While we have the necessary equipment, it isn't exactly in the best shape, y'know. The company didn't exactly buy top of the line stuff"

Fix: ^You decide to send several crew members to fix the loose plating. Suiting up in the equipment, they head outside the ship. While tethered to the ship, they manage to secure the plating. However, during the process one crew member's tether breaks loose, causing them to float away in the void.
Damage: ^You decide to just let the plating be. The damage done will be minimal, and the equipment the crew would use isn't all that safe. Within the hour, the loose plating breaks off, weakening the integrity of the ship.
